lead_paragraph: MATZ--Glenmore M. 77, passed away on May 6, 2016. He was the husband of Kathleen (Yodzio) Matz. Glenn was an Eagle Scout, served with US Army in France, and was the founder and CEO of Corby Industries in Allentown, PA. His Corby Key placed Corby Industries in the Fortune 500. Glenn was a pilot of 50 years plus and member of the Aircraft Owners and Pilots Association. Survivors: wife Kathleen; sisters JayCee Hoffman and husband Dr. Pete Hoffman of Croton-on-Hudson, NY, Judith Ann Skeels and husband Ralph Skeels, III, of Woodbury, NJ; nephews Peter M. Hoffman of Castle Rock, CO, Dennick Skeels of Arlington, VA. Services: Memorial Service and luncheon on Saturday, June 18, 2016 at 11:30am at Calvary Bible Fellowship Church, 6782 N. Main St, Coopersburg, PA 18036. A memory tribute may be placed at: www.longfuneral home.com. Contributions: In lieu of flowers, to a charity of one's choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MATZ, GLENMORE M
